name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free B2B Phone Number & Email Finder

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find business email address, personal emails and phone numbers
short.ko: React, Typescript, Vite를 사용한 크롬 익스텐션 보일러플레이트입니다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AeroLeads Free B2B Phone Number & Email Finder Chrome plugin helps you to find business emails, personal emails, and direct phone numbers. 

✔ How it works
-------------------------------------------------------------

Install the extension and follow the instructions. You can access https://aeroleads.com/search from the plugin too. 

✔ Who can benefit from AeroLeads chrome extension?
-------------------------------------------------------------

Sales professionals, Lead generation teams, Recruiters, Human resource professionals, Startups, Business executives, Business analysts, and marketing Teams use aeroleads to find b2b emails, personal emails, and direct line numbers of their prospects.

✔Export the email list (CSV/Excel)
-------------------------------------------------

Extract all Emails to CSV or Excel including all the information required to successfully start a cold email personalisation campaign.

✔ FAQ
-------------------------------------------------

1, Is this B2B Phone Number & Email Finder plugin totally free?

The extension comes with a free trial where you can add a few records to test the software. 

2. Where are the email records getting added?

To your default list https://aeroleads.com/prospects or the list you selected. 
 
3. I am still not sure how this plugin works.

Please check this page https://aeroleads.com/help to see how the Email finder software + plugin works. You are always welcome to use website chat or email us too.

4. Can I verify emails with this? 
No, For this, use our other email verifier plugin at the Chrome store or use our free tool https://aeroleads.com/email-verifier
 
5. What about Data Privacy and GDPR? 

Please check our privacy policy at https://aeroleads.com/privacy. We do not own any data added and owned by you. We do not identify our Google chrome plugin users or track their usage. We comply with Google Chrome Developer Terms of Service and Program Policies.

✔ Getting started
-------------------------------------------------

Starting to work with Email Finder takes only a few steps: 

 - First of all, Install the Email Finder extension from the Chrome Web Store (Here) 

 - Then, create an Aeroleads account, this takes a few seconds and can be done with your Google credentials.

 - Finally, start building your email lists to find people's emails that matter to your business.
 
Sign up at Aeroleads.com right now and get 10 free email credits to find the email of your prospect.
 
https://aeroleads.com/users/register

** Our Google Chrome Plugin Privacy Policy **
-------------------------------------------------
We do not own any data added and owned by you. We do not identify our Google Chrome plugin users or track their usage. We comply with Google Chrome Developer Terms of Service and Program Policies. Please check our privacy page to know more about it.

There are huge efforts made by the Aeroleads team behind Email Finder.

We hope you will enjoy the app and would like to encourage you to express your thoughts and let us know about any issues via the website contact https://aeroleads.com/contact or chat https://aeroleads.com/chat or by emailing to hello@aeroleads.com
